item.title: Your First Click
item.description: The bones can be played in a variety of ways, each with its own strengths and quirks. In this page, we will learn the basics of how the bones work and how you can play your first click. Grip The most common way to hold the bones is to have a single pair in the hand. As for where in the hand to put the bones, one way is to slot one bone between the base of the index and middle fingers, and the other between the middle and ring fingers.
